wanigasinha mahatha pawasayi.2005 warshayedi hektayara 5374ka the waga kala athara, me wanawita eya hektayara 6333 dakwa wardhanaya wi thibe.kagalla disthrikkaye the wagakaruwangen siyayata asu thunakma kuda the wagakaruwan wethi.maha parimana the wagakaruwan pramanaya siyayata dahahathak wana athara, disthrikkaye hektayara ata dahas thunsiya haththa hatharaka the waga kere.kagalla disthrikkaye the karmantha shala wissak kriyathmaka we.danata disthrikkaye warshika the nishpadanaya metrik ton dahasaya dahasak pamana wana athara, idiri wasara thunaka kalaya thula eya metrik ton dahaatadahas pansiya hata ekak dakwa ihala nanwimata apekshitha bawa disthrik lekamwaraya pawasayi.ee sandaha niwaradi ghanathwayakin waga bimwala pala situwimath, pol waga wani wenath wagawan athara the wagawa sandaha gowin unandu kirimath yojithaya.the dalu nelima ha prawahanayedi siduwana hani walakwa ganimin the kuduwala pramithiya ihala nanwimatada me yatathe katayuthu karana bawa wanigasinha mahatha wadiduratath kiya..

rupiyal koti pansiyayakata wadi watinakamakin yuth amerikanu dolar nottu wyaja lesa mudranaya kirimata sudanamwa siti wideshika yuwalak polis wishesha karya balakaye wishesha kandayamak eeye (21) kolambaa di athadanguwata gena thibe.mema yuwala wyaja lesa mudranaya kala rupiyal hata atalakshayak pamana watina dolar 100 mottu 450k sakakaruwan langa thibi hamu wi atha.mema yuwale pirimi jathikaya kamarun wana athara kanthawa mali rate bawa polis parikshanawalin anawaranaya wi thibe.sakakaruwan dedena wyaja dolar siyaye nottu hara laksha wisi dedahasak nishpadanaya kirima sandaha sakas kara thibu kadadasi thogaya, mudrana yanthraya saha dijital seppu dekak saha sukhopabhogi motar rathayak polis athadanguwata gath bawa polis prakashaka jyeshta polis adhikari prishantha jayakodi mahatha pawasiya.kolambaa galu muwadora pradeshaye pihiti sukhopabhogi hotalayaka mema yuwala randi sita atha.

mudal amathyanshaye nirdeshayak nomathiwa rupiyal laksha thunsiya panahakata (350) miladi gena genwa hitapu uuwapalath maha amathi shashindra rajapaksha saha wideshakatayuthu amathyanshaye hitapu adhikshana manthri sajin was da gunawardhanage pudgalika pariharanaya sandaha yodawa thibu adi sukhopabhogi bas ratha deka sandaha masakata rupiyal nawa laksha haththa dahasaka (ru. 970,000) mudalak gewiya yuthu bawath me dakwa masa 60ka higamudalakda pawathina bawath ema lisin samagama wenuwen peni siti nithignyawariyak ada (23) adhikaranayedi dakwu karunuwalin anawaranaya wi thibe.

jathyanthara kantha siwkon ekdina tharagawaliye eeye (29) nedarlanthaya ha shri lankawa athara pawathi tharagaye di kadulu 8ka jayak wartha kirimata shri lanka kantha krikat pila samath wiya.kasiye wasiya dinu shri lanka pile aaradhanayen palamuwa panduwata pahara dun nedarlantha kandayama oowara 38kadi siyalu dena dawi raskara ganu labuwe lakunu 66 ki.nedarlantha pile wadima lakunu labhiniya wuye miranda warninmira ya.

me yatathe 2010-11 kalaya thula thotalanga waligodawaththa, boralla kasal para, bambalapitiya aadi pradesha wala niwasa siyagananak kada iwath kala athara, 2013 di kompanynyawidiye akkara 8ka idamaka pihita niwasa 400kata aasanna gananak ek dinakin bimata samathala kota ema idama indiyawe tata samagamata wikunana ladi.
me pradeshaye iskolawala thiyena adupadu man paththareka dakka.

janadhipathiwarayage da nada sambandhayak sahitha bawa pawasamin ali patawun jawarame pamini pirisak wisin udawalawa jathika udyanayata ayath batahira mayimata wannata pihiti galpaya pradeshayedi nirwindanaya kara allaganna lada ali patawaku traktarayakin prawahanaya karamin sitiyadi mese wanajiwi niladharinge asa gasunada ee pilibanda harihati rajakariya karannata wanajiwiyatawath, polisiyatawath nohaki wiya.
upanda sita wedi warusa mada marana biye diwi gewu ee asaraniyan thawamath windinne dukamaya.
boho wita le galima nawathi.
maithripala swichayak oba ee wana thuru andure thibu wedikawa, pittaniya saha pare pihituwa thibu layit kanu aalokamath karanawa mata mathakaya.
me mohothe badaginnen pelena kenekuta wiyali aahara noweyi awashya pisu aahara!
